title: genomeLocation
description: Location of a sequence object used both by display, and by jbrowse to render a browser.

assembly.description: The assembly on which the position and chromosome are based.

startPostion.description: the start position of the location.

endPosition.description: the end position of the location.

chromosome.description: the chromosome of the genomic feature.  Note: whatever loaded here, will be used in JBrowse.
